events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The insurance claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the nature of the car collision described.
An agent has been assigned to manage the investigation and processing of your vehicle accident claim.
Your claim related to the car collision has been received and acknowledged by our claims department.
To proceed with the claim, please submit your vehicle registration, police report, and photos of the accident damage.
The requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos have been submitted for claim processing.
An investigation into the circumstances and liability of the vehicle collision claim has officially begun.
The investigation regarding your car accident claim has been completed and all relevant facts have been verified.
We have prepared a settlement proposal based on the investigation results and damage estimates for your vehicle.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and your satisfaction with the claim process so far.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following your acceptance of the settlement terms offered.
Payment corresponding to the approved claim amount for your vehicle damages has been issued successfully.
Your auto accident claim case is now closed as the final payment has been processed and accepted.
The documentation for your closed auto accident claim has been securely archived for future reference.
